title: Sentence Pruning Result Schema
description: JSON schema for sentence_prune() function output - defines structure for query-conditioned sentence masking results with cross-encoder scoring

chunk_id.description: Unique identifier for the chunk being pruned

kept.description: Array of sentences kept after pruning with their scores and spans

span.description: Character span [start, end) within original chunk

score.description: Cross-encoder relevance score for query-sentence pair

group_kept.description: Whether sentence was kept due to group-keep rules vs score threshold

co_entailing.description: List of sentence IDs that co-entail with this sentence

code_fence.description: Whether sentence is within code fence boundaries

chunk_score.description: Recomputed chunk score as max/avg of kept sentences

original_token_count.description: Total tokens in original chunk before pruning

pruned_token_count.description: Total tokens in kept sentences after pruning

query_hash.description: SHA-256 hash of the query used for conditioning

threshold_used.description: Score threshold applied for sentence selection

fallback_unpruned.description: Whether fallback to unpruned chunk was triggered

processing_time_ms.description: Time taken for pruning operation in milliseconds

$comment: Invariants: spans within original bounds; sum(tokens)>0 unless fallback; chunk_score computed from kept sentences
